query:
select 
 item, count (*) TOTAL,
 Round(sum(CASE WHEN subinventory_code = 'MSWPF1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) FG,
 Round(sum(CASE WHEN subinventory_code = 'MS9P-PIC' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) TRAN
FROM apps.xxbi_cyp_onhand_inv_v@osfm
where organization_code = 'F07'
and department_code = 'PIC-LR4'
and (item like '%PIC-10410%')
Group by item
